ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the assistant phone field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(AssistantPhone) && NOT(ISNULL(AssistantPhone )) && NOT(ISBLANK(AssistantPhone)) && !REGEX(AssistantPhone ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(AssistantPhone)) && NOT(ISBLANK(AssistantPhone)) && !REGEX(AssistantPhone,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for assistant phone. The minimum number of digits should be 10
